website_summaries.verdict: With its classy-looking jade roller and engraved gua sha tool, Akarell's set is a bargain.
pros: By most accounts, the jade roller works as described
The jade has a nice weight to it
The kit comes in a bold green jade or soft rose quartz color
cons: The bigger roller doesn't always roll easily

customer_reviews.title: After checking all the bad reviews on this kind of product of many brands
customer_reviews.text: After checking all the bad reviews on this kind of product of many brands, I was quite worried!! But my roller arrived in one piece, I am so happy I've made a good choice! The Roller is well made and rolling well, I love the gua sha! The seller follow up is professional. Can't wait to see the improvement on my face!!
customer_reviews.author: Yuhui Li

customer_reviews.title: Results and an for excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for both and easy to use! I love the versatility of these tools and I am very happy with the results so far. I have noticed better tone in my skin after using for 6 days. The Gua Sha tool is my favor thing for lymphatic drainage and depuffing. The contour is coming back to my face. The roller is excellent over sheet masks or for additional de-puffing. Bonus points to the company for sending a follow up to ensure the items were delivered as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: I used this for one day and the smaller end popped off. Not impressed with quality and disappointed to return cause I really need one of these!
customer_reviews.author: PBurton

customer_reviews.title: I really like the small roller because it moves fine
customer_reviews.text: I really like the small roller because it moves fine, and feels nice under the eyes. However, the big roller is a big miss. The big roller barely moves. You have to apply a lot of pressure in order to make the big roller move even a little bit. But the problem with that is that you dont want that friction against your skin, pulling and tugging on the skin is not what I am looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Ina

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing and made with REAL jade
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing and made with REAL jade. Already I notice a difference in how my face feels and I keep it at my desk to use it throughout the day. They even send you a detailed manual which is very helpful. Package was sent on time, very professional and helpful! Thank you Green Lotus! Update: after using this for some months now it has made a noticeable difference. I forgot to mention that when I first received it the larger roller head was a little stiff so I added some olive oil and it worked just fine. It's hard to find such good quality for such a good price. Thank you again!
customer_reviews.author: honest shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Little ball end did not roll. Then it fell off, could not glue it on. Skin scraper does not work but feels nice on skin. Larger roller squeaks, barely rolls, short handle, poor quality. Skip it.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail

customer_reviews.title: The Best Tool’s I’ve Used
customer_reviews.text: I have quite a few Gua Sha tools, but these are now my go to’s. The scraping tool fits the contours of my face extremely well and is very easy to angle. I keep the roller in the freezer and use it on my eyes every morning. It really helps the circles and puffiness! It is also strongly made and sturdy without being heavy and awkward. These 2 products come with an instructional guide that is emailed, and I found it to be very helpful. I’ve used these tools everyday for a month now and get compliments on my skin daily.
customer_reviews.author: Debra M. Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after minimal use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this item. It seemed great at first! Unfortunately, I was only able to use it two or three times before all of the metal fittings came apart and my jade roller broke into three pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Suellen R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great products. I have used other jade rollers before, but this one is better than all of them. It is excellent quality and the stone is very wide and covers a lot of area on your face. I havent used the other item yet and have never heard of that type of beauty regimen, but I am looking forward to using it. It’s a very smooth pretty stone and it feels great on the skin. Excellent customer service and would recommend this product to anyone. Looking forward to trying any other items by this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Nilda

customer_reviews.title: NO SQUEAKING- ROLLS PERFECTLY!!!! SO HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: This was the second jade roller I bought from amazon after I had to return one from a different brand. Jade rollers are known to squeak and have issues with rolling easily - but not this one. I was so so happy when this roller arrived in perfect condition and DOES NOT SQUEAK EVER!! I have used it morning and night for a few days now and it really helps to de-puff my face. I read hundreds of reviews for dozens of rollers and finally settled on this one and I’m so glad I did because this is a quality jade roller!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roll your stress away
customer_reviews.text: I admit I jump on the had roller craze, I didn’t really understand what it was really for. I left it in the box for awhile and then finally after a stressful night at work used it. First off, I would like to say it has a funky smell... I washed the jade roller with some dish soap to get it off... But secondly, my gosh, it is amazing. The coolness feels so good and I can really roll out my tension in my jaw. Idk if it is using the roller, but my acne has also cleared up? I’m not sure why. But anyways, I love this, my husband loves this. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: echung

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't squeak
customer_reviews.text: The roller and Gua Sha was packaged perfectly and comes with nice bags for storage. The best thing is that the roller absolutely does not squeak. I bought a different roller before this one and returned it because it squeaked on every roll. This one is completely silent and allows for a relaxing spa experience. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item comes in a nice package with individual bags for the jade roller and ...
customer_reviews.text: Item comes in a nice package with individual bags for the jade roller and the gua cha tool. Sturdy roller, made with real jade. Minor nitpick: The roller is a bit squeaky when used. Still, not a deal breaker. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. What a paint to have to return immediately
customer_reviews.text: THIS FELL APART ON BOTH ENDS THE SECOND I TOOK IT OUT OF THE BOX. BUYER, BEWARE! THE ROLLERS FELL RIGHT OFF THE WAND. Very disappointed. What a paint to have to return immediately. SHAME ON THIS MANUFACTURER.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Looks as expected
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this product to help with skin redness and puffiness. I've only had it a couple of days, but it is well made - gorgeous product. Rolls easily on the face AND I even use it on my ankles because of its cooling properties and it appears to help with some of the swelling I get at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: I really love both items
customer_reviews.text: I really love both items, the large roller doesn't always roll tho, I am hoping it will roll better as I use it more. Other than that I would give both items 5 stars. Arrived quickly and both are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It is absolutely what I wanted! The price is perfect, it came packaged nicely and was in perfect condition. I’ve been seeing online how jade rolling is good for your skin and I am a skincare fanatic so I wanted to try it but not spend an arm and a leg. This roller is beautiful and leaves my skin glowing. I have mild rosacea and it has even helped with the redness and puffiness after sleeping. I put it in the fridge and use it before bed and in the morning. My serums set much better into my skin. Definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: A-Rose788

customer_reviews.title: I’m not happy I have Bell’s palsy and I need it for ...
customer_reviews.text: Is broke, I’m not happy I have Bell’s palsy and I need it for my therapy
customer_reviews.author: vitan murillo

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in perfect condition and is honestly really cute. I put it in the freezer every day and use it to roll. It’s very good quality! I used a different “ice roller” that made a horrible sound when I rolled it on my face but this one is quiet and feels wonderful! It is a little heavy which supports the fact that it’s good quality :) I would recommend this to others. I also love how it’s a combination because a lot of other sites I was on sold each product separately and at a higher price.
customer_reviews.author: Ruffina Silva

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful roller
customer_reviews.text: Nice roller, good quality and works well. I like the fact that it came with the Gua Sha tool. I liked it so much I mostly use the tool and even bought extra ones. After using the gua sha tool on my face I feel like the roller is too smooth and maybe isn’t as effective as the Gua Sha.
customer_reviews.author: Lety

customer_reviews.title: The roller I received was very nice and of good quality
customer_reviews.text: The roller I received was very nice and of good quality. The packaging was also aesthetically pleasing. Would make a good gift. Each tool has its own pouch for travel. If you want the e-manual you must say yes that allow for them to send emails at the time of checkout. The manual was short and to the point and also well designed.
customer_reviews.author: silvertopfox

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST JADE ROLLER
customer_reviews.text: These are the best jade rollers I’ve ever purchased over the years, and I’ve had over 50. Very well made, the frame is well made and you can tell it’s a upgrade, I’ve had quite a few fall off the frame and they squeak and aren’t as well made. Also very pleased with the Gua Stone as well. I will be purchasing only these in the future when I need more. I am a professional Esthetician and have been using jade rollers for years.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C.

customer_reviews.title: Recently Purchased
customer_reviews.text: This product was recently purchased so I have no way of knowing its effectiveness. The rollers were nicely packaged, of heavy weight and finely made, clear instructions, which I downloaded and copied. I can say that the rollers feel great as I roll then over my face.
customer_reviews.author: pattycap

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Real jade roller that is built well and packaged well. I can't say how well it works, as I am new to this but it does feel awesome on my skin and I look forward to using both!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good product. The large stone is a little squeaky when rolled, but overall, I am happy with it. I dropped the roller on my second use and the large stone popped off but I was able to pop it back on. Hopefully it doesn't become a problem. I was hoping for a little instruction card on how to use the Gua Sha tool, but I was able to look it up on the Internet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased multiple because I gifted them for holidays. I made sure to get myself one as well and I love it! I usually do it after I've moisturized in the morning and again at night. Comes with a nice bag to keep it protected when not using it.
customer_reviews.author: clairemeleon

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've seen fake jade rollers without an accompanying gua sha for $15-$20 more than this set, to put this awesome deal into perspective. The shipping was very fast and customer service from this seller is way above par. The roller/gua sha set itself is high quality and I've already purchased another as a gift for my mom. Jade rollers are great for really getting serums/moisturizers into your skin, as well as depuffing and anti-aging. I love the way the gua sha feels underneath my eyes when I step out of the shower in the morning, and it helps that it depuffs my under-eye area. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Marie

customer_reviews.title: I returned item because it was cheaply made and I was hugely disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken: larger roller was completely detached from handle — the glue wasn’t enough to hold it in place. Then the smaller roller popped off the wire handle... I returned item because it was cheaply made and I was hugely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DesCas05

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love!! I’m a massage therapist and I use the little foot looking tool to break up the fascia in my thumb pads so I can do more with less soreness and pain and it’s amazing!!! The roller is just a bonus to me. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: April A

customer_reviews.title: I love this roller
customer_reviews.text: I love this roller! It is so incredibly soothing and feels very cool on my skin. I have been using it a couple of times a day and it has become a big part of my beauty and wellness routine. My skin looks and feels great - I have noticed a decrease in puffiness when I wake up, and when I do have that problem, a session of gentle rolling while I am checking my emails does the trick! I'm very happy with this product. The seller is great and offers excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Anna K.

customer_reviews.title: Best quality out there!
customer_reviews.text: I order the rose quartz roller from Akarell and I liked the quality and size so much that I made another order for their jade roller. It is the same terrific quality! I am pleased. The Akarell jade roller is superior to all others out there on Amazon. I have others to compare it to and the Akarell is the best. Great customer service, comes with a e-mailed use booklet, and the packaging is very beautiful, too. They ship on Prime, so I did not have to wait weeks to receive it. Thank you, Sam at Akarell for a great experience and products. I am a very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Pehrson

customer_reviews.title: I bought it on a lark because I like gadgets. I enjoy using this new toy because ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it on a lark because I like gadgets. I enjoy using this new toy because of the way it feels on my face and I have noticed some benefits as well. I’s a great company to do business with.
customer_reviews.author: L. Caruana

customer_reviews.title: it falls apart every time i use it, but i like it
customer_reviews.text: Ug. Well, this item came quickly and was nicely packaged. It has taught me that jade rolling is awesome and addictive. However, the big jade roller falls out EVERY time i use it (the little one is fine). I have gotten pretty skillfull at catching it as it falls and popping it back in. But it would be a more relaxing experience if i wasnt always on guard about it falling out.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen osullivan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! There was a small problem with shipping, but the seller jumped in and handled it before I even noticed. The roller is made of quality materials and I love the way my face feels during and after I roll it!
customer_reviews.author: Regina M. Maestri

customer_reviews.title: Well made roller
customer_reviews.text: Love the roller! Beautiful and looks to be real jade! Very well made. Super fast shipping. Thank you! Would definitely order from again
customer_reviews.author: teamroper

customer_reviews.title: Happy but sad
customer_reviews.text: Hi this is Iris thank you for asking the jade roller and shake is amazing that's awesome I am starting to see a difference but I had issue with my order I receive more orders and more were trying to come had to call and cancel a couple of orders that are slowly coming but there were others that were received we're in the process of sending back so I can get my money back . Thank you for asking
customer_reviews.author: Iris Mack

customer_reviews.title: This product showed up the first time broken. We ...
customer_reviews.text: This product showed up the first time broken. We messaged Akarell and they instantly fixed the issue and sent other after the original was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised and delighted to discover I could feel the cooling effects of ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised and delighted to discover I could feel the cooling effects of the Jade Roller even after I was finished rolling my face. While I can't attest to its having magic powers to make me look younger, it sure does feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This roller is great, easy to use. I use it at night before going to bed, my skin feels softer.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Still learning the technique, but I am loving it so far. They even reached out to me to make sure it arrived in tact. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle N.

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Tools
customer_reviews.text: I scowered amazon trying to find smaller business to support. These are really nice! The big rollers are great. Only thing is Id prefer bigger gabs between the ridges on the gua sha. But these are perfect starter tools.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great roller on skin!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the roller for only a few days & I really, really love it! Your skin feels so smooth & so relaxed after each use. I call this the face massager. I plan to keep on using it every night & will give an update months from now. But so far, my skin feels so smooth & relaxed. I’m sure this will help with elasticity. The seller is also very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Great jade stone roller and stone
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product and enjoy using it. I would do business with them again. Yes i reccomend them. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: bee

customer_reviews.title: feels a little cheap but works great!
customer_reviews.text: what can i expect? it was a good deal and gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: jaye smith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this product for a few day, but so far no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Annlou Bodden

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, especially if you keep in freezer before using. Although I wonder if metal on side will begin to rust.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with the product. It’s beautiful, and more importantly - it feels amazing on my skin. I’ve read that people put it in the refrigerator, but I have found that it is naturally cool enough on its own. I love that this is genuine jade stone at a reasonable price. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Dwin

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the customer service and quality of these tools. I tried several other cheaper versions and was very disappointed with the squeakyness and size. This one is great and I will be using it in my Skin Care Salon on my clients and bought one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Yanez

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, would be a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Arrived quickly. Well made. Helps under eye bags and general puffiness.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made roller
customer_reviews.text: This roller seems sturdy. I’ve had a head cold since I purchased it, and the cool jade out of the fridge has been really soothing for my congestion. Both sides roll really well and everything was intact when I got my package.
customer_reviews.author: Sandstorms

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: This company is a pleasure to deal with and the product is well made and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Akarell Jade Roller
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and arrived on time. I like that I also received an email with instructions and to contact Akarell with any questions. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Irvin

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the face!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Was in excellent condition and is a useful asset for the face. I like how nicely it was packed. Can certainly make a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I just wish the large jade piece would roll like the small one, but other than that -- I love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and good product
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using the roller for a couple days, so don't see any results yet. However, it does feel great while doing. My only complaint, if I can even call it that, would be that the smaller roller does not roll smoothly like the larger. I'm hoping a little oil may help with it. It wasn't a big enough problem to ask for an exchange though. As for the customer service, I'm very happy. Due to my own neglect of the email settings I chose, I hadn't received the e-instructions for proper use. My email request was promptly responded to and instructions were included.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Sobacki

customer_reviews.title: very happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: After looking around a lot, decided on this jade roller and am very pleased with it. It comes packaged beautifully and I have been using it for over a month, rolls perfectly, no issues, and am very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Both items are crafted beautifully, very pleasant to touch and arrived in a nice package. I am looking forward to making a good use of it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: K. Makarova

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this roller. I use it a couple times a day and it really works!
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely sturdy and high quality. The instructions are very clear and concise. I absolutely love this.
customer_reviews.author: Besmith

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My sister loves it. She tells me she uses it every day and she's buying me one for my birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go to product
customer_reviews.text: Hands-down amazing product, I am so happy that I purchased this Jade roller ! The quality the company everything is worth way more than 5 stars. Keeping it in the fridge/freezer is absolutely amazing. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Alyce

customer_reviews.title: broke within a month
customer_reviews.text: Broke easily don’t buy now I have to buy another
customer_reviews.author: claudia perex

customer_reviews.title: Face feels good!!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on-time and in perfect condition. I keep it in the freezer and use it morning and evening. While I don't know what long term benefit I may see -- my face feels really good after using the roller. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: BGE

customer_reviews.title: HEAVEN
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE FACIAL TOOLS. THEY ALSO FEEL VERY COOL AND SOOTHING WHEN USING ON FACE. VERY SATISFIED.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice set!! Order this!
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging, really high end looking! Each comes with its own draw string pouch. Nice quality. Glad I ordered!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lee Murray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and beautiful.Feels great on skin.I use both pieces every day. happy about my choice.Would buy again for gift.perfect choice.Love love love.thank you.
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, poor construction, excellent service
customer_reviews.text: Roller arrived in two pieces. five stars for customer service, seller was motivated to resolve this issue in multiple ways to my satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Hassel

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the jade roller is broken when i received it, totally disappointed
customer_reviews.author: tham wai feng

customer_reviews.title: Broken when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: My roller was broken upon arrival. Doesn't even look like it fits well. Also kit said it came with book or manual, there are NO instructions. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Winslow

customer_reviews.title: Breaks and falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy! Horrible. Fell apart and makes noises when using. Now my roller ball is in 3 pieces and I can’t use it any more. Cheap!
customer_reviews.author: shah

customer_reviews.title: Recipient pleased with the gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gave as wedding gift. Recipients very happy with the gift! Several people wanted to know where I got this So I referred them to AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Robbins-Worthy

customer_reviews.title: Feels good
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I’ve only used it 3 times so no significant change yet but I can tell you that it feels amazing rolling the cold jade on my face. Product came in perfect no scratches or broken parts. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Heart

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but the quality and packaging is impeccable. I don't know how to use it correctly. I didn't see instructions in the box. I'm awaiting the instruction manual.
customer_reviews.author: P DeBride

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Arrived in good condition and excellent customer service. The jade is really real and I love the feel of the roller in my hands. Easy to use and assemble! I've been using it everyday since it arrived!
customer_reviews.author: wang

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SKIN CARE TOOL
customer_reviews.text: Love using this roller. Really helps my face. I use it every morning and night.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap products
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this product but when I opened the box, the stone was broken. The roller makes a lot of squeaky noises.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Feels great when I put it in the freezer. Made well. Rolls well over the face.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a very timely manner. Quality is good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this roller!!
customer_reviews.text: I love using my roller and Gua sha every day.. the jade is beautiful, naturally cold and soothing. The product is very well made and now an essential part of my beauty routine!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Feels great.
customer_reviews.text: Love using my roller on clients. I roll serum into skin much better penetration. I use it cold on clients face, they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Beauchamp

customer_reviews.title: Happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a quality product. Packed very nicely. Appreciate the additional piece that came with the roller. Hoping to get lots of use from the set.
customer_reviews.author: S. R.

customer_reviews.title: Love both products
customer_reviews.text: Love both products!! I’m extremely pleased with the customer service Green Lotus provides. I will definitely be purchasing more products with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: The packaging and the actually tools far exceeded my expectations, especially given the price compared to more expensive Jade rollers. So far so good, it seems like a quality and very sturdy items and I have enjoyed using it for the past couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality of the product. I would recommend this company to anyone looking to try both the roller and Gua Sha
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart when I took out of box, like the scraping tool though.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ballenger

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit disappointed that the roller wasn't welted together as well, but a little gorilla glue help put it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not bother
customer_reviews.text: It was broken when it arrived and when I tried to put it back together, another piece came apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jordon

customer_reviews.title: Real jade, but weak construction.
customer_reviews.text: NOT GREAT. This is real jade (and very heavy), but somehow in the box the items that were carefully nestled in their foam holder was broken. The large roller was completely detached from the handle. When I attempted to reattach it (I thought that maybe I was supposed to attach it upon arrival), I realized that it had simply been broken off. The box arrived just fine, so someone mailed it already broken. ALSO, when I tried to place the top roller back on (with very little pressure) it popped out of the holder. That was the last straw for me, too heavy and created with poor (weak) construction. What a waste of time. : (
customer_reviews.author: Dbrando

customer_reviews.title: Is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Is really easy to use and the presentation is really nice. It didn't come with the book
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good Rollers, but brackets may not hold up.
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and made in China (which is appropriate for something used for Chinese medicine!), but appears to be relatively sturdy, and certainly looks good. The rollers themselves are nice and smooth and look good, and are carefully drilled to rotate smoothly (no wobble). Really a decent product. The brackets holding the rollers don't look very strong, but the rollers are worth the cost by themselves, and I will see if the brackets hold up.
customer_reviews.author: alwaysmprest

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriends uses more than me!
customer_reviews.text: These are super nice. I use them to massage my moisturizer into my skin... However my boyfriend gets nights massages from them as well. He's come to use/like them more than me!
customer_reviews.author: Spooky Kitty

product_meta.title: A:KARELL Jade Roller For Face & Gua Sha SET 100% Real Chi Himalayan Jade Anti Aging Skincare Therapy Tool Jade Facial Roller Depuffing Anti-Wrinkle Facial Roller De Puffer Massager
feature_bullets: ✅100% REAL JADE:The Premium A:KARELL Jade Roller for face and Gua Sha set is made of real jade stone. We are only sourcing the highest quality jade from Liaoning province to craft the best handmade products. Please note that due to the nature of the real jade stone each piece varies in color from the picture listed.

✅MADE TO LAST: The robust frame of our Jade roller for face has been upgraded to avoid the Jade stone bumping, squeaking and falling off when using it. Each one of our premium jade roller massager and Gua sha are HAND-CHECKED to ensure that our customers have the highest quality experience with a product make to last. Our product is well protected by foam inside a box packaging, no damage risk during transportation. |jade eye roller for puffy eyes|

✅BIGGER SIZE STONE: The Biggest ball of the Jade roller massager is 30% bigger than the other jade facial roller on the market. It makes the rolling action easier, no need additional pressure to make it roll. It also ameliorates the THERMAL INERTIA, it means that if you put your Jade roller in the fridge before using it, the Jade stone will stay cold during the all time of the treatment to fully improve the natural tone of your skin.

✅E-MANUEL: A full instruction manual on how to use your Akarell Jade Roller and Gua Sha Pro set for the best results will be delivered to you by mail after your purchase (Make Sure you don't OptedOut of our After-Sales Mail) , Included diagram for face massage techniques, step by step target zone guide and, all the information you need to perfectly integrate the jade roller skin-revitalizing and Gua Sha genuin set into your skincare routine to Revitalize Your Body and Depuffing Eyes.

✅LYFETIME WARRANTY: Akarell Jade Derma Roller for face and Gua sha scraping tool set comes in a beautifully designed package with 2beautiful pouches. It is the perfect gift of health and self-care for someone special! If you’re not 100% thrilled with our durable and ergonomic anti-aging face slimming tools then we promise to offer you a prompt and full refund whitin 30 days and a lifetime warranty, no question asked!! It's the best deal you can get. |dermaroller wrinkle treatment|
